sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Member } from 'src/app/_models/member'; import { MembersService } from 'src/app/_services/members.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-member-list', templateUrl: './member-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./member-list.component.css'] }) export class MemberListComponent implements OnInit { /** * */ constructor(private _mservices:MembersService) { } members:Member[]=[]; ngOnInit(): void { this.loadMembers(); } loadMembers(){ return this._mservices.getMembers().subscribe({ next:response=>{ this.members=response }, error:error=>console.log(error) }) } }
